problem.markdown:
Select the best description for the Completeness dimension:
>>Select the one correct answer<<
(x) A. Completeness is assessed by measuring whether all the entities that are supposed to report actually do so. ( ) B. Completeness is assessed by measuring whether any entities report at all. ( ) C. Completeness is assessed by measuring how consistently entities report their data.
[explanation] Completeness is assessed by measuring whether all the entities that are supposed to report actually do so. [explanation]

multiplechoiceresponse.p: Select the best description for the Completeness dimension:
multiplechoiceresponse.label: Select the one correct answer

choicegroup.choice: A. Completeness is assessed by measuring whether all the entities that are supposed to report actually do so.
B. Completeness is assessed by measuring whether any entities report at all.
C. Completeness is assessed by measuring how consistently entities report their data.

div.p: Completeness is assessed by measuring whether all the entities that are supposed to report actually do so.
